Body:
t = Template(
    """
        <%%!
            callcount = [0]
        %%>
        <%%def name="foo()" cached="True" cache_type='file' cache_dir='%s'>
            this is foo
            <%%
            callcount[0] += 1
            %%>
        </%%def>

        ${foo()}
        ${foo()}
        ${foo()}
        callcount: ${callcount}
"""
     % module_base)
m = self._install_mock_cache(t)
assert result_lines(t.render()) == ['this is foo', 'this is foo',
    'this is foo', 'callcount: [1]']
assert m.kwargs == {'type': 'file', 'dir': module_base}
